content.text: Since the death of George Floyd, protests exploded across the world. I have seen enough police brutality here in Hong Kong, I can see not only systematic racism going on in North America, but I also see the protocols of police are simply wrong, I am sure most of the judgment by the police were trained, therefore kneeling on an African American could be part of the training, when you see something which is fundamentally wrong, you've gotta change from the root instead of keeping talking how to solve racial problems, you've gotta change from the root, retrain all police in order to end #policebrutality.

node.excerpt: you've gotta change from the root instead of keep talking about racial problems, you've gotta change from the root, retrain all police in order to end #policebrutality.

content.text: Here is where I express my thoughts on Investing, Cooking, and Programming!
I am sharing my thought on how to get better every day, this blog acts as self-reflect, as well as self-expression, you like random but thoughtful blog posts from me, feel free to subscribe!
Like many people, I can't focus just on one single thing, but I need to remind myself of trying my best to stay focus and a soldier my way towards success.

Take programming as an example, I was all over the place, Javascript, Node, Typescript, React, Django, Python, C, Golang, etc. I only dabble here and there pretty much makes me a failure in all of them. Therefore I promise myself that I will focus on Javascript and React, when I am fluent in Javascript for sure I can learn more about Typescript and more, once I master the React framework with React Hooks API, I can conquer other frameworks. 

Focus is the key!

node.excerpt: stay focus on one programming language
